attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i hear a loud thud upstairs. i went to check it out and both my parents and my dog were on the ground, unconscious. i went to go get help from my neighbor and she was unconscious too. it knocked every living thing out in a 20 mile radius. greatly unappreciated 😡.
attributes.title: no thank you

attributes.review: This app is just terrible because it’s from Donald  trump idk what else to say because just saying Donald trump is terrible is enough

attributes.review: This app looks like it was made in a group project by a buy a group of 10 year olds. There is no reason for an app like this to be in the App Store.

attributes.review: I met this app at a restaurant and it bit me screamed and threw a chair at my grandma, if you download this app you’re anti-puppies and babies and want to kill children

attributes.review: everytime i try to run this app i keep on getting pop up adds on my cell phone. this is outrageous!! i cant go 5 minutes without an add in my face, and there is no way to stop them too. i accidentally clicked on one and it gave my phone a virus!!!!
attributes.title: adds and viruses
